title: Ill Conceived
description: A Haunting PastGrandma Louise hears a scream in the middle of the night. When no one else does, the police dismiss it as an old woman’s ravings. Aimee Brent, an ambitious, dedicated reporter for the North Shore Carrier, the Lake Tahoe newspaper, sets out to prove Grandma right. In so doing, she’s forced to face her past, a past filled with so much darkness that it threatens her very existence and leads her down a twisted, dangerous road from which she may never return.Scroll to the top of the page and click “Buy Now” button.In LC Hayden's latest female sleuth novel, ILL Conceived, the past and present converge as Aimee Brent tries to solve the murder of young Lauri Evans and comes smack up against the secret of her own mother's brutal death. The surprise ending is a shocker.
